entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect var type deduction #64747
  • Don't offer non-abstract and non-virtual statics after type parameter #64733
  • New `prop` semantic snippet doesn't place cursor where expected #64731

Closed

  • Speculative semantic model produces different behavior for local functions #24135
    Compiler.Next
  • Speculation within attributes on local functions is broken #60801
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33014.230 #64748
  • LSIF fails to generate for some projects with "Could not load file or assembly `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp, Version=4.0.0.0".... #64491
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Read required project properties from evaluation data #64749
    Area-IDE
  • Recover from the Exception in IdleProcessor #64746
    Area-IDE
  • Clarify diagnostic when constant pattern has non-constant conversion to input type #64741
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove support for recoverable syntax trees #64739
    Area-IDE
  • Fixed prop snippet caret position #64732
    Area-IDE, Community

Merged

  • Cache indices against our PEReference object, not the underlying metadata ID #64742
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Upgrade our compiler to 4.4.0-2.final #64745
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Speculative semantic model - create child member models for attributes and parameter default values. #64634
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64744
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64743
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add binding redirects for compiler binaries for the LSIF tool #64740
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update VS Platform NuGet package version #64667
    Area-Infrastructure, OnDeckForQB
  • Use workspace services to implement test hooks #64158
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use the required keyword and newer attributes #64738
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add new helper to allow more code to use consistent transformer #64736
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64737
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update solution using existing helper #64735
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Generate different DocumentIds for duplicate generators #64729
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64727
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64730
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Ensure we include a projectId along with our ProjectChanged notification #64722
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForQB, Next
  • Correct package names in PublishData.json #64734
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64728
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Do not use CWT for Task<Compilation> #64623
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix ArgumentOutOfRangeException from using speculative semantic model #64691
    Area-IDE, Next
  • [LSP] Write lsp logs to xunit output during tests #64689
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Skip csharpsourcegenerators.findreferencesforfilewithdefinitioninsourcegeneratedfile #64726
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64750
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Encoding serialization #64625
    Area-Compilers
  • Use IAsyncEnumerable in NavigateTo OOP calls. #64576
    Area-IDE
  • Use a more consistent pattern for updating the solution in a WOrkspace #64644
    Area-IDE
  • Scoped implicitly-typed lambda parameters #64680
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Semantic snippets - constructor snippet #64489
    Area-IDE
  • Disable Windows PDB conversion #64581
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Name anonymous delegate parameters #64604
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Track 'default(T)' null checks #63444
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Extend test coverage for lambda default parameters #64530
    Area-Compilers
  • Track local constant usage in attributes #64660
    Area-Compilers
  • TextLoader method override detection #64192
    Area-IDE
  • Report obsolete diagnostics for types named var/unmanaged/notnull #64717
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Enhance rule metadata and suppression info in SARIF V2 errorlog #64277
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Add support for code refactorings and code fixes in non-source files #64364
    Area-Analyzers
  • Caller of an async local function cannot expect any of the callee’s code to execute #64482
    Area-Compilers
  • Unskip CSharpSoruceGenerators.InvokeNavigateToForGeneratedFile test #64626
    Area-IDE
